product_name: Werner Carve F Adjustable Stand Up Paddle
long_description: Answer the call of the waves with the Werner Carve F Stand Up Paddle. It features a full-size fiberglass blade for a low-cadence paddling style and an adjustable length for multiple users. Suitable for multiple paddlers of different heights, the Werner Carve F Adjustable Stand Up Paddle telescopes to fit 2 size ranges: 74 - 81.5 in. and 80 - 87.5 in. Suited to powerful paddlers who want the most glide from every stroke, the blade's large surface area offers maximum catch in the water for a low-cadence paddling style. Lightweight fiberglass and carbon blend shaft offers light flex on every stroke and feels warm in the hands; oval shape of shaft increases overall control. Fiberglass-laminate blade provides lightweight power; long and slender profile turns responsively in surf and rough water. Long, rectangular blade offers nuanced power application; use the tip for a quick maneuverability and the entire blade for deep, forceful strokes. Durable T-shaped ABS palm grip fits naturally in your hand, refining control for a variety of paddle strokes.
short_description: Answer the call of the waves with the Werner Carve F Stand Up Paddle. It features a full-size fiberglass blade for a low-cadence paddling style and an adjustable length for multiple users.
